channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ​​​​Woman's easy trick for banishing ants 'works like a charm' - all you need is school staple
item.description: It’s important to wipe down, vacuum, sweep or mop surfaces regularly and clean up spills immediately and any food leftover should be sealed and put away in the fridge

item.title: 14 children end up in hospital after trying ‘adult only’ crisps
item.description: The 'R18' crisps are made using an extract from the ultra-spicy ghost pepper.

item.title: 'I had a baby at 15 and another at 18 - and I wouldn't change a thing'
item.description: When two lines showed up on the pregnancy test, 15 year old Tia was gobsmacked. But as soon as she saw those two pink lines, she knew she was going to step up to the mark

item.title: Woman describes out of body aura she felt in near-death experience after crash
item.description: 'The experience has allowed me to see the beauty of life.'

item.title: Woman uses 85p Home Bargains product to make white trainers 'spotless' again
item.description: Candice showed how she got her stained white trainers looking brand new again

item.title: Sheep start behaving strangely after eating 100kg of cannabis in greenhouse
item.description: The herd munched an entire crop of weed.

item.title: What's the obsession with sea moss? Algae that makes you 'glow from the inside out' explained
item.description: We're taking a look at the rise and rise of sea moss with the help of experts. So can this 'miracle', nutrient-rich ingredient help you to glow from the inside out or is it just another TikTok-born fad? We find out...

item.title: Blind mystic Baba Vanga made a chilling prediction for 2025
item.description: 28 years after her death, Baba Vanga's predictions seem to be coming to fruition.

item.title: 'Entitled little boy wouldn't stop kicking plane seat – so I took revenge'
item.description: A woman has taken to the internet to explain how she managed to terrify a disruptive child into behaving on a packed flight when his parents seemed unable to do so

item.title: Man tries to smuggle 100 snakes in his trousers and it goes as you’d expect
item.description: He was trying to walk through the 'nothing to declare' gate when he was stopped.
